author: 示例作者
title: 基于DAMA-DMBOK2框架的企业数据治理成熟度评估研究
abstract_cn: 本研究基于DAMA-DMBOK2框架,构建了企业数据治理成熟度评估模型。通过案例研究方法,分析了5家企业的数据治理实践,识别了影响成熟度的关键因素。研究发现,组织文化、高层支持和技术能力是数据治理成功的三大要素。本研究为企业提升数据治理能力提供了理论指导和实践参考。
abstract_en: This study develops a data governance maturity assessment model based on the DAMA-DMBOK2 framework. Through case study methodology, we analyze data governance practices in 5 enterprises and identify key factors affecting maturity levels. The research reveals that organizational culture, executive support, and technical capabilities are the three critical success factors. This study provides theoretical guidance and practical reference for enterprises to enhance their data governance capabilities.
